![Partner Spotlight | Huddle01](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/40b5bb76a0d59e046fca904950d3b2f0.jpg)

<p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://huddle01.app/">Huddle01</a> is building the future of decentralized connections, and Unlock DAO has been a long-standing advocate and user of the tool! Tomorrow, Friday, May 9th, we are joined by Huddle01 Product Manager <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ramit-agarwal-46547316b/">Ramit Agrawal</a> to learn more about the story of Huddle01, how Ramit got involved, and exciting things the team is currently launching.</p><p>Huddle01 is a demand-first DePIN dedicated platform accelerating digital connectivity with highly optimised, low-latency data routing for distributed systems. The tool stands out by offering lightning-fast, secure, and private audio and video calls, as well as live streaming, through its decentralized network of nodes. This eliminates the need for centralized servers and reduces costs by up to 95%. With features like Web3 wallet logins, token-gated meetings, crypto-powered incentives, and seamless integration with decentralized identities, Huddle01 empowers communities to host scalable, borderless meetings and events while maintaining full control over their data.</p><p>Since its launch, Huddle01 has facilitated more than 73 million minutes of meetings for more than 90k users and is quickly becoming the communication backbone for leading DAOs and Web3 projects worldwide.</p><h2 id="h-questing-with-huddle01-and-unlock" class="text-3xl font-header">Questing with Huddle01 and Unlock</h2><p>As an official Nexus Partner with Huddle01, we have our own quest that allows you to claim an official badge as a reward by following a few steps as indicated in the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/huddle01com/status/1918980604781269041">official post</a> via X. We will show the full process tomorrow during the stream. Nonetheless, here are all the  steps to lay claim to the badge:</p><ul><li><p>Head to the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://unlock-protocol.com/">Unlock Protocol website</a> and create a lock (e.g., event ticket) on the <strong>Arbitrum</strong> blockchain</p></li><li><p>Host a token-gated meet on <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://huddle01.app/">Huddle01</a> using the lock you created</p></li><li><p>Invite frens for a quick chat to complete the quest</p></li><li><p>Claim the Unlock Badge on the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="http://testnet.huddle01.com">Huddle01 testnet</a> </p></li></ul><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><a href="https://x.com/huddle01com/status/1918980604781269041" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" style="cursor: pointer;"><img src="/images/blog/partner-spotlight---huddle01/7951b133eee0d77e9e5be913261ebcf2.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="675" nextwidth="1200" class="image-node embed"></a><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><h2 id="h-get-your-exclusive-invite" class="text-3xl font-header">Get Your Exclusive Invite</h2><p>This time, the Unlock Protocol powerd invites are limited to just ten pieces. They come with a special benefit of being able to join the livestream and ask Ramit questions in person. Don't miss out:</p><div data-type="embedly" src="https://app.unlock-protocol.com/event/partner-spotlight-huddle-01" data="{&quot;provider_url&quot;:&quot;https://app.unlock-protocol.com&quot;,&quot;description&quot;:&quot;Building the Future of Decentralized Connection Join us for a special livestream featuring Ramit Agrawal, Product Manager at Huddle01, a demand-first DePIN dedicated platform accelerating digital connectivity with highly optimised, low-latency data routing for distributed systems.
